description: Format used to define structures visible on town screen in VCMI
title: VCMI town structures format

___animation.description: Main animation file for this building

___z.description: Position on screen. Buildings with higher value will be drawn on top of other buildings

___area.description: Area that indicate when building is selected. Must be 8-bit image

___border.description: Golden border around building, displayed when building is selected

___hidden.description: If upgrade, this building will replace parent animation but will not alter its behaviour
